query:
SELECT 
  'Test Shrimp Recipe' as recipe_type,
  r.id,
  r.name,
  r.restaurantId
FROM recipes r
WHERE r.name = 'Test Shrimp Recipe'
UNION ALL
SELECT 
  'Other Recipes' as recipe_type,
  r.id,
  r.name,
  r.restaurantId
FROM recipes r
WHERE r.name != 'Test Shrimp Recipe'
LIMIT 5;
